lyrics.stanza: Glory! Glory! Christ is life indeed! Glory! Ever does the Spirit lead! Weakness turns to power, Darkness turns to light! Glory! Glory! Christ is life indeed!
Glory! Glory! Live by Christ today! Glory! Walk in Spirit and obey! Failure turns to vict'ry, Sighing turns to song! Glory! Glory! Live by Christ today!
